name: fbsql_fetch_assoc
purpose: Fetch a result row as an associative array

return.description:
Returns an associative array that corresponds to the fetched row, or
   FALSE if there are no more rows.If two or more columns of the result have the same field names, the last
   column will take precedence. To access the other column(s) of the same
   name, you must use fbsql_fetch_array and have it
   return the numeric indices as well.
